mechanics.condition: An aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead is within 30 feet of caster AND spell's detection is not blocked
mechanics.outcome: Caster knows if such a creature exists and its exact location

mechanics.condition: A place or object within 30 feet of caster has been magically consecrated or desecrated AND spell's detection is not blocked
mechanics.outcome: Caster knows if such a place or object exists and its exact location

mechanics.trigger: Spell's detection ability attempts to penetrate a barrier
mechanics.condition: Barrier consists of 1 foot or more of stone

mechanics.trigger: Spell's detection ability attempts to penetrate a barrier
mechanics.condition: Barrier consists of 1 inch or more of common metal

mechanics.trigger: Spell's detection ability attempts to penetrate a barrier
mechanics.condition: Barrier consists of a thin sheet of lead or more

mechanics.trigger: Spell's detection ability attempts to penetrate a barrier
mechanics.condition: Barrier consists of 3 feet or more of wood or dirt

description_text: For the duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 feet of you, as well as where the creature is located. Similarly, you know if there is a place or object within 30 feet of you that has been magically consecrated or desecrated.The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.
